hypothesis: RI tokens in AZC diagram positions serve as 'see also' pointers to semantically related A content
summary: Vocabulary clustering hypothesis falsified through controlled testing

frequency_control.interpretation: CONFOUND - testable MIDDLEs in top 13% by frequency

section_control.interpretation: EFFECT COLLAPSES when separated by section

conclusions: 1.92x overlap effect was artifact of frequency bias and section composition
No vocabulary clustering beyond baseline when properly controlled
Confirms C835: linker function is navigational, not semantic
No new constraint warranted - existing architecture covers observations
